name: ISSEN
headline: AI realtime voice companion for language learning
description: ISSEN is an AI conversational language app that helps you become fluent. Your on-demand voice tutor is personal to you, adapting lessons and chats to your particular interests, learning style, and goals. Our mission is to transform language learning by offering a level of connection, effectiveness and fun that, until now, only human teachers could provide.

founders.name: Anton Apostolatos, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of Issen. Ex-Palantir (Chief Architect of Infra / Head of Palantir LATAM). Stanford AI.

founders.name: Mariano Sorgente, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of issen, your AI foreign language tutor.  
Experienced in crypto and AI, in engineering and VC.
Previously a16z.

generated_description:
### Company Overview: ISSEN

- **Name:** ISSEN
- **Founded:** 2024
- **Location:** New York, NY
- **Team Size:** 2
- **Y Combinator Batch:** F24
- **Group Partner:** Dalton Caldwell
- **Website:** [issen.com](https://issen.com)
- **Tags:** Education, Generative AI, Consumer, AI, New York

### Mission
ISSEN aims to be your personal AI companion for language learning, providing a real-time voice tutoring experience. It’s designed to help users achieve fluency by adapting lessons to their individual learning styles and preferences. Think of it as a personal tutor that's available 24/7.

### Product Offering
ISSEN offers an AI-driven language learning app that creates a conversational environment similar to interacting with a human tutor. Users can engage in real-time dialogues, where the AI listens and responds, adjusting the conversation based on the user’s interests and learning goals. The key features include:

- **Conversational Learning:** Engage in natural back-and-forth dialogue.
- **Adaptive Tutoring:** The AI adjusts to your proficiency and learning style over time.
- **Flexible Learning Structure:** Switch between structured lessons and casual chats.
- **24/7 Availability:** Learn anytime, anywhere.

### Languages Offered
ISSEN supports a vast array of languages, from widely spoken ones like Spanish and Mandarin to less common choices like Afrikaans and Welsh. This broad selection means learners can dive into their preferred languages without barriers.

### Customer Experience
Users have praised ISSEN for its effective conversational practice, the realism of the AI interactions, and the personalized pacing of sessions. Testimonials highlight its adaptability and the realistic feel of conversation that helps reduce the pressure often felt in traditional learning settings.

### Pricing
Currently, ISSEN offers its service at a discounted rate of **$29/month**, allowing users the flexibility to cancel at any time. A free trial also gives you 10 minutes to start interacting with your AI tutor.

### Summary
ISSEN is redefining language learning with a focus on personalized interaction and real-time adaptation. Whether you're at home or on the go, this innovative app integrates the strengths of human tutoring into the digital realm contextually and interactively, making language acquisition engaging and effective. If you’re looking for both a practical and enjoyable way to become fluent, ISSEN might just be your new favorite learning tool. 

---
This summary captures the essence of ISSEN while staying straightforward and engaging, just as one would hope with any start-up aiming to create a meaningful impact in the education sector.
